title: Unify Customer Identity
description: A customer has interacted with the brand on multiple devices and channels. An analyst needs to unify these touchpoints into a single customer profile in the CDP.

tasks.description: Identify multiple user profiles that likely belong to the same person (e.g., same email but different device cookies).
tasks.expected_outcome: The CDP's identity resolution algorithm flags potential matches.

tasks.description: Merge the duplicate profiles into a single, unified customer view.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent merges the profiles, combining all associated events and attributes.

tasks.description: Verify that the unified profile now contains the complete history of the customer's interactions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the new profile and confirms it is complete.
